Articles.Content:
Hullo again ksp forum!

I was on a short hiatus from here due to some unforeseen issues, but now I am back and ready to roll.

I am SO happy to be a part of such a fantastic and transparent community.

It seems things have changed a little bit around here since i was last here, but with such a wonderful and supportive community surrounding such a fantastic game, surely this place is just as friendly and open to opinion as ever.

see you guys round!
Welcome to the forums! Glad to have you aboard again. Make yourself at home.
